page.title: 03UP HATHERLEY DEVELOPMENT
page.content: { { Up Hatherley}is a suburb of {Cheltenham}and over the years it has grown a great deal.In{1851}it was a small village with about{37}people.The first addition to Hatherley was the Coombe Glen estate in about{1960}which made Hatherley much bigger. The{1984} plan was to build a new {Greatfield Park Estate}and to make a new{link road}from the A46 Shurdington road to the A40 Cheltenham/Gloucester road.This{link road}is still being considered,according to the plan it will be built in{1992,}but it could be completed by{1987}if local pressure is successful. The Estate is opposite some other houses where we did a survey on a sample of 20 residents.The questions we asked them follow on page 4.
